SEARCH
Package org.udem.unishop.services

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
org.udem.unishop.services.UserService
public class UserService extends Object
Service class for handling user-related operations.

      Constructs a UserService class with a specified UserRepository.

  • Method Details

    • login

      public User login(String username, String password, AccountType accountType)
      Attempts to log in a user with the specified credentials and account type.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user attempting to log in.
      password - The password associated with the username.
      accountType - The type of account for which the login is attempted.
      Returns:
      The logged-in user if successful, null otherwise.

    • getUserById

      public User getUserById(UUID userId)
      Gets a user by their unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique identifier of the user.
      Returns:
      The user corresponding to the provided identifier.

    • getUserByUsername

      public User getUserByUsername(String username, AccountType accountType)
      Gets a user by their username and account type.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user.
      accountType - The account type of the user.
      Returns:
      The user corresponding to the provided username and account type.

    • createBuyer

      public boolean createBuyer(List<String> inputs)
      Creates a new buyer with the provided inputs and saves it to the user repository.
      Parameters:
      inputs - A list of string inputs containing information for creating a buyer.
      Returns:
      true if the buyer is successfully created and saved, false otherwise.

    • createSeller

      public boolean createSeller(List<String> inputs)
      Creates a new seller with the provided inputs and saves it to the user repository.
      Parameters:
      inputs - A list of string inputs containing information for creating a seller.
      Returns:
      true if the seller is successfully created and saved, false otherwise.

    • addLikedProduct

      public boolean addLikedProduct(UUID userId, UUID productId)
      Adds a product to the list of liked products for the specified buyer.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique identifier of the buyer.
      productId - The unique identifier of the product to be added to the liked products list.
      Returns:
      true if the product is successfully added to the liked products list, false otherwise.

    • removeLikedProduct

      public boolean removeLikedProduct(UUID userId, UUID productId)
      Removes a product from the list of liked products for the specified buyer.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique identifier of the buyer.
      productId - The unique identifier of the product to be removed from the liked products list.
      Returns:
      true if the product is successfully removed from the liked products list, false otherwise.

    • addProductToSeller

      public boolean addProductToSeller(User user, UUID productId)
      Adds a product to the list of products associated with the specified seller user.
      Parameters:
      user - The seller user to whom the product is being added.
      productId - The unique identifier of the product to be added to the seller's products list.
      Returns:
      true if the product is successfully added to the seller's products list, false otherwise.

    • getUsers

      public UserList getUsers()
      Gets a list of all users in the system.
      Returns:
      A UserList containing all users in the system.

    • getBuyers

      public UserList getBuyers()
      Gets a list of all buyers in the system.
      Returns:
      A BuyerList containing all users in the system.

    • getSellers

      public UserList getSellers()
      Gets a list of all Sellers in the system.
      Returns:
      A SellerList containing all users in the system.

    • addUserLike

      public boolean addUserLike(UUID buyerId, UUID sellerId)
      Adds a like from a buyer to a seller, increasing the seller's like count and updating the buyer's liked sellers.
      Parameters:
      buyerId - The UUID of the buyer.
      sellerId - The UUID of the seller.
      Returns:
      true if the like was successfully added, false otherwise

    • removeUserLike

      public boolean removeUserLike(UUID buyerId, UUID sellerId)
      Removes a like from a buyer to a seller, decreasing the seller's like count and updating the buyer's liked sellers.
      Parameters:
      buyerId - The UUID of the buyer.
      sellerId - The UUID of the seller.
      Returns:
      true if the like was successfully removed, false otherwise

    • addReviewToBuyer

      public void addReviewToBuyer(UUID buyerId, UUID reviewId)
      Adds a review to the list of reviews associated with a buyer.
      Parameters:
      buyerId - The UUID of the buyer.
      reviewId - The UUID of the review to be added.

    • removeItemFromCart

      public void removeItemFromCart(Buyer currentUser, CartItem cartItem)
      Removes a cart item from the shopping cart of the current buyer and updates the user information.
      Parameters:
      currentUser - The buyer whose shopping cart is being modified.
      cartItem - The cart item to be removed from the shopping cart.

    • addItemToCart

      public boolean addItemToCart(User currentUser, Product product, int quantity)
      Adds a specified quantity of a product to the shopping cart of the current user.
      Parameters:
      currentUser - The user whose shopping cart is being modified.
      product - The product to be added to the shopping cart.
      quantity - The quantity of the product to be added.
      Returns:
      true if the product is successfully added to the cart, false otherwise.

      public void setPassword(UUID id, String input)
      Sets a new password for the user with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the user.
      input - The new password to be set.

    • setPhoneNumber

      public void setPhoneNumber(UUID id, String input)
      Sets a new phone number for the user with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the user.
      input - The new phone number to be set.

    • addFollowed

      public boolean addFollowed(UUID buyer, UUID followed)
      Adds a user with the specified ID to the list of users being followed by another user and awards 5 fidelity points to both users.
      Parameters:
      buyer - The unique identifier of the buyer user.
      followed - The unique identifier of the user being followed.
      Returns:
      true if the user was successfully added to the list of followed users, false if the user was already in the list.

    • removeFollowed

      public boolean removeFollowed(UUID buyer, UUID followed)
      Removes a user with the specified ID from the list of users being followed by another user and deducts 5 fidelity points from both users.
      Parameters:
      buyer - The unique identifier of the buyer user.
      followed - The unique identifier of the user being unfollowed.
      Returns:
      true if the user was successfully removed from the list of followed users, false if the user was not in the list.

    • addOrderToUser

      public void addOrderToUser(UUID id, Order id1)
      Adds a new order to the list of orders associated with a user identified by the provided ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the user.
      order - The order to be added to the user's list of orders.

    • removeOrderFromUser

      public void removeOrderFromUser(UUID id, UUID orderId)
      Removes an order with the specified order ID from the list of orders associated with a user identified by the provided ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the user.
      orderId - The unique identifier of the order to be removed from the user's list of orders.

    • clearCart

      public void clearCart(UUID id)
      Clears the shopping cart of a buyer identified by the provided user ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the buyer.

    • updateOrder

      public void updateOrder(Order order, OrderState orderState)
      Updates the state of the specified order for both the seller and the buyer.
      Parameters:
      order - The order to be updated.
      orderState - The new state of the order.

    • updateUser

      public void updateUser(User currentUser)
      Updates the information of the specified user in the user repository.
      Parameters:
      currentUser - The user whose information needs to be updated.
